title: first install error
body: I've installed lol and it all went fine except when I launch the client for the first time it doesn't download all the resources instead it gives me a blank screen with only the league logo, please help I want to play.

replies.body: If SephirothSG's suggestion doesn't work, please go through the [**Setting up your Permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) Riot Games Support article. The issue you described is often caused by permission issues, so hopefully your patcher will be running smoothly after you go through the steps.

Hey there,

Have you tried running the game as Administrator? (Right click > Run as admin)
